description:
The day of the big rehersal for the drama club play, Touya and Misaki finish the props and clothes.  However, Tamaru insists that they change the color to "monotone."
In desperation, Touya and Misaki turn to Touya`s father for help. The three work all night and manage to get the work done, but Touya oversleeps and misses Yuki`s appearance at the fair. The next day is the day of the play, but the two of them are sent away before they can see it by Tamaru.
An infuriated Misaki takes Touya and sneaks into the closed second floor of the Hall, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Memories Don`t Need to Be Prettied Up Like a Play. The Minute You Say Them Aloud, They`re All Lies.
Omoide ni Kinokiita Scenario wa Iranai. Kuchi kara Deta Shunkan, Douse Minna Tawagoto
思い出に気の利いたシナリオは要らない. 口から出た瞬間, どうせみんなたわ言
